title: Sound On:  Rep. Gimenez, Afghanistan, Climate
itunes:title: Sound On:  Rep. Gimenez, Afghanistan, Climate
description:
Guests: Morgan Ortagus, former State Department spokesperson, Frank Maisano, Partner at Bracewell’s Policy Resolution Group, and Rep. Carlos Gimenez, a Republican representing Florida's 26th congressional district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
